description: Internal Bank for every team at IBM to manage their blue dollars

values: That's not a valid card number. Do you want to try again?
That's not a valid card number. Do you want to try again?
Your card has been activated. Can I help you with anything else?
Your card has been Canceled. Can I help you with anything else?
Okay, we can definitely do that. Can you please share your card number?
Sure. Can you share your card number?
I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
Okay. We have registered your order for a replacement card. You will be receiving an email soon. Can I help you with anything else?
I can help you activate your card, replace it, transfer money and much more. What would you like to do today?
Yeah! We allow loans for cars and houses. Our interest rate is 10%. Can I help you with something else?
Hello. How can I help you?
